name: Pond Fighters (DEMO 2)
description:
What is Pond Fighters

Pond Fighters is a soccer game combined with a arena game, where the player's will fighter each other, while trying to score goals.

Pond Fighters is currently in development, and in need of feedback!

Feedback Form ->https://forms.gle/ZsjdjfLoYq9GeErH6

Twitter->https://twitter.com/ParkerOHara3

Controls

A & D: Left and right movement

Space: Jumping

Ctrl: Slide

Left Click: Primary Attack

Right Click: Secondary Attack
